Package de.freaklamarsch.systarest

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CircularBuffer<E>
    Implementation of a circular buffer.
    CorsFilter
    ContainerResponseFilter to allow fetch calls from client side JavaScript.
    DataLogger<T>
    A DataLogger can be used for logging data entries represented as T[] to delimited text files.
    DeviceTouchSearch  
    DeviceTouchSearch.DeviceTouchDeviceInfo  
    FakeSystaWeb  
    SystaIndex
    class representing the known indices of the SystaWeb UDP data packet.
    SystaRESTAPI
    class for creating a Jersey resource that offers a REST API for a Paradigma SystaComfort II For running this class a SystaRESTServer is required
    SystaRESTServer
    The main function of this class starts an HttpServer for providing SystaRESTAPI.
    SystaStatus
    Class for holding the status of a Paradigma SystaComfort II heating controller.
    SystaWaterHeaterStatus
    Provides the status information of a Home Assistant @see Water Heater
